verificationEmailContent: We've sent a verification link to your email. If you don't see it, you may need to check your spam folder.
noFlashCards: Click on this icon in lessons, readings and elsewhere to collect your own flashcards. You can review them here.
flashCardReviewCompleted: Congratulations! You have completed your flashcard reviews for today.
wantReviewMore: I want to review some more
noReadingTitle: There is no reading title available in the category.
noReading: Failed to load reading material. Please try again.
continueReading: Would you like to continue reading?
setError: Failed to save to database. If the problem persists, please contact the developer.
writingComment:
Your writing will be corrected by a Korean teacher. 
Please provide answers within the character limit. 
You can expect a response within 24 hours, although it may take longer if there are many requests. 
You'll be notified when the correction is completed. (Only for users who have enabled notifications.) 
Once the correction is complete, you can check it on the writing tab of the main page.
You can make up to 3 requests, and once a response is completed, you can make another one. 
The following cases are not eligible for correction: 
 - Non-Korean writing 
 - Irrelevant or personal questions 
 - Writing that is difficult to understand. 
(It is recommended to practice based on what you have learned)
wantRequestCorrection: Do you want to request a correction?
requestNotAvailableTitle: All correction requests have been used.
requestNotAvailableContent: Please wait a moment until your correction is completed.
noMyWritings: Complete the lesson and try the writing practice. Your writing will be displayed here after correction. (Excludes some lessons, For subscribed users only.)
name: Name
logOutDetail: Do you want to log out?
removeDetail:
Do you want to remove your account? 
(If you have been logged in for a long time, you may be prompted to re-login.)
feedbackDetail: Please send us your awesome ideas.
premiumDetail: Premium is automatically renewed. The price can be changed without prior notice. When a subscription is set to automatically renew, it will be renewed at the existing price even if the amount has been increased. However, if the amount has been decreased, it will be renewed at the reduced price. In the case of cancelling a subscription and then resubscribing, it will be charged at the updated price. For any purchase-related issues, please contact us at akorean.help@gmail.com.
premiumComment: Podo strives to truly enhance your Korean language skills.
exitApp: Would you like to exit the app?
replyDetail:
- You can only reply once per message. 

- Your and other users' replies may be posted in the 'Best Replies' section after review by a native teacher. 

- You can read and add 'Best Replies' on your flashcard until the message is expired.
sendReply: Would you like to send a reply?
noBestReply: There is no selected best reply yet.
wantRemoveFlashcard: Do you want to remove flashcard(s)?
wantRemoveWriting: Do you want to remove this writing?
unLimitFlashcard: Would you like to subscribe to the app and collect unlimited flashcards?
wantReplyPodo: Would you like to subscribe to the app and send a reply to Podo?
purchaseContent: Improve your Korean language skills with podo
trialComment:
Enable notifications 
and enjoy 10 days free Premium! 

(No payment information required)
trialActivated: The free premium features have been activated.
shouldRestart: You must restart the app after changing the language.
